channel.title: Docs on Cookie's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Cookie's Notes

item.title: Discord Bot Boi
item.description: As a starter programming project, I wanted to try creating a discord bot to track the steps collectively taken by a community towards a total community step goal. I used discord.js, a Node.js module that is used to interact with the Discord API.\ The discord bot is hosted on the site Heroku. New Terms Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform JavaScript runtime environment for executing JavaScript code. Open-Source means software where the original source code is made freely available and may be redistributed and modified.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: My goal for a while has been to create a webiste, but I would get quickly overwhelmed everytime I tried starting. Hugo has been a huge help to get me over that hurdle. I hope to use this website to post my notes. I followed a video tutorial to get myself started using Hugo. [Video Link] Hugo Hugo makes static websites, static websites load faster than dynamic websites that use things like wordpress.
